name: Starchild (Misekn)
description:
Every day, the stars are faced with a challenge to get to the sky and shine the way we see them every night.

Sometimes we take those shiny dots as granted, but they make a big effort every day to help guide us, it's time for us to help them for once!

Note: this is my first Game Jam game completed in time. It was hectic but I learned a lot and managed to barely meet the deadline. Hope you enjoy it :)
